This approach is designed to help companies grasp the new wave of AI and accelerate the establishment of automated processes and new services. 

ISLASH helps business achieve :
1.Messages for Business and Chat Commerce
2.No-Code Chatbot and AI Autopilot Assistance
3.360-degree view of customers
4.Large Scale WhatsApp Message Broadcast
